settings.title: Our Community
settings.text-block-content: Follow @erstwilder on Facebook and Instagram for all the latest updates, and TikTok for fun content too. Plus, make sure you join us and other like-minded accessory lovers in the Official Erstwilder Community Group, where thousands of Erstwildians are sharing their special moments, unboxing experiences, design suggestions, storage solutions and much more!

settings.title: Facebook Messenger
settings.text-block-content: Another easy way to get in touch with us is via Facebook Messenger. We love a good chat and we’ll be hanging out there during standard business hours, 9:00am – 5:00pm, Monday to Friday (Melbourne Australia time). We’ll do our best to check any messages outside of those times too.

settings.title: Press / PR / Media
settings.text-block-content: Are you an artist, brand or influencer who wants to collaborate? Have a media request? Email us at press@erstwilder.com

settings.title: Wholesale
settings.text-block-content:
Interested in becoming an official Erstwilder stockist? Please get in touch via our wholesale contact page for a response with priority or email us at wholesale@erstwilder.com

*Alden Howard & Co. are the official agency representing Erstwilder in the USA & Canada.
